page.title: 04Oris Ltd.
page.content: This is a factory making sausage casings.Abattoirs thoughout the U.K. supply sheep and pigs intestines which are cleaned in salt and brine.When this process is finished,the casings are sent to Hetton le Hole factory where they are graded for width and then packaged.1500 miles of sausage casing is produced each week and sent to sausage manufacturers throughout Europe and the World. 22 men work in the local factory.Half live in the Hendon area while the other half travel from Newcastle,where the original factory was.
